price: 3. Annagaa (waa Alle'e) ka yeellay Qur’aan af Carabi ah, si aad u fahantaan.
arabic: إِنَّا جَعَلۡنَٰهُ قُرۡءَٰنًا عَرَبِيّٗا لَّعَلَّكُمۡ تَعۡقِلُونَ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: innā jaʿalnāhu qur'ānan ʿarabiyyan laʿallakum taʿqilūna
